Size: Up to 2 m tall. Can occasionally climb to 4 m.
Stem: Reddish or purplish, smooth, with fine hairs when young becoming hairless with age.
Leaves: In pairs, green with a purple tinge or bright reddish-purple.
Flowers: Tiny and whitish in dense clusters up to 2 cm long in the leaf forks.
FruitSeeds: Tiny brown and hidden in the old flower parts. Containing a single seed.
Habitat: Roadsides, waste areas, urban areas, bushland edges, lawns.
